body:
<!-- Thanks for filing an issue! Before hitting the button, please answer these questions.-->

**What keywords did you search in Kubernetes issues before filing this one?** (If you have found any duplicates, you should instead reply there.):
`generic garbage collector`

---

**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?** (choose one): BUG REPORT

<!--
If this is a BUG REPORT, please:
  - Fill in as much of the template below as you can.  If you leave out
    information, we can't help you as well.

If this is a FEATURE REQUEST, please:
  - Describe *in detail* the feature/behavior/change you'd like to see.

In both cases, be ready for followup questions, and please respond in a timely
manner.  If we can't reproduce a bug or think a feature already exists, we
might close your issue.  If we're wrong, PLEASE feel free to reopen it and
explain why.
-->

**Kubernetes version** (use `kubectl version`):
```
Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"6+", GitVersion:"v1.6.0-beta.3", GitCommit:"0cd5ed469508e6dfc807ee6681561c845828917e", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2017-03-11T04:20:22Z", GoVersion:"go1.7.5", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"6+", GitVersion:"v1.6.0-beta.3+coreos.0", GitCommit:"7013c674183a8b4ee3b3dd846f108e3a5575f4af", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2017-03-13T19:57:10Z", GoVersion:"go1.7.5", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
```

**Environment**: 
- **Cloud provider or hardware configuration**: Openstack
- **OS** (e.g. from /etc/os-release): 
```
NAME="Container Linux by CoreOS"
ID=coreos
VERSION=1235.9.0
VERSION_ID=1235.9.0
BUILD_ID=2017-02-02-0235
PRETTY_NAME="Container Linux by CoreOS 1235.9.0 (Ladybug)"
ANSI_COLOR="38;5;75"
HOME_URL="https://coreos.com/"
BUG_REPORT_URL="https://github.com/coreos/bugs/issues"
```
- **Kernel** (e.g. `uname -a`): `Linux kubernetes-kubernetes-zone2-0-1489429353 4.7.3-coreos-r2 #1 SMP Thu Feb 2 02:26:10 UTC 2017 x86_64 Intel Xeon E3-12xx v2 (Ivy Bridge) GenuineIntel GNU/Linux`
- **Install tools**: Custom/self-hosted
- **Others**:


**What happened**:
Upgraded to v1.6.0-beta.3
The controller-manager now exits with an error:
```
I0315 09:53:04.487779       1 leaderelection.go:179] attempting to acquire leader lease...
I0315 09:53:20.180799       1 leaderelection.go:189] successfully acquired lease kube-system/kube-controller-manager
I0315 09:53:20.183242       1 event.go:217] Event(v1.ObjectReference{Kind:"Endpoints", Namespace:"kube-system", Name:"kube-controller-manager", UID:"108ccd1a-088f-11e7-a3e3-fa163ea3f702", APIVersion:"v1", ResourceVersion:"4993858", FieldPath:""}): type: 'Normal' reason: 'LeaderElection' kube-controller-manager-1772421362-7hkj9 became leader
I0315 09:53:20.292311       1 controllermanager.go:437] Started "resourcequota"
I0315 09:53:20.292407       1 resource_quota_controller.go:240] Starting resource quota controller
E0315 09:53:20.294995       1 util.go:45] Metric for serviceaccount_controller already registered
I0315 09:53:20.295061       1 controllermanager.go:437] Started "serviceaccount"
I0315 09:53:20.295133       1 serviceaccounts_controller.go:122] Starting ServiceAccount controller
I0315 09:53:20.296259       1 controllermanager.go:437] Started "daemonset"
I0315 09:53:20.296423       1 daemoncontroller.go:199] Starting Daemon Sets controller manager
I0315 09:53:20.298282       1 controllermanager.go:437] Started "statefuleset"
I0315 09:53:20.298425       1 stateful_set.go:144] Starting statefulset controller
I0315 09:53:20.299062       1 controllermanager.go:437] Started "cronjob"
I0315 09:53:20.299171       1 cronjob_controller.go:95] Starting CronJob Manager
I0315 09:53:20.301445       1 controllermanager.go:437] Started "endpoint"
E0315 09:53:20.404609       1 controllermanager.go:430] Error starting "garbagecollector"
F0315 09:53:20.404634       1 controllermanager.go:181] error running controllers: Failed to start the generic garbage collector: no matches for {stable.k8s.psg.io v1 certificates}
```

The last line changes each crash:
```
F0315 10:04:10.781701       1 controllermanager.go:181] error running controllers: Failed to start the generic garbage collector: no matches for {monitoring.coreos.com v1alpha1 prometheuses}
```

Another slightly different crash:
```
I0315 10:09:15.988508       1 leaderelection.go:179] attempting to acquire leader lease...
I0315 10:09:33.648559       1 leaderelection.go:189] successfully acquired lease kube-system/kube-controller-manager
I0315 10:09:33.648700       1 event.go:217] Event(v1.ObjectReference{Kind:"Endpoints", Namespace:"kube-system", Name:"kube-controller-manager", UID:"108ccd1a-088f-11e7-a3e3-fa163ea3f702", APIVersion:"v1", ResourceVersion:"4996554", FieldPath:""}): type: 'Normal' reason: 'LeaderElection' kube-controller-manager-1772421362-7hkj9 became leader
E0315 10:09:33.881597       1 util.go:45] Metric for serviceaccount_controller already registered
I0315 10:09:33.881761       1 controllermanager.go:437] Started "serviceaccount"
I0315 10:09:33.881881       1 serviceaccounts_controller.go:122] Starting ServiceAccount controller
I0315 10:09:33.883229       1 controllermanager.go:437] Started "job"
I0315 10:09:33.885197       1 controllermanager.go:437] Started "deployment"
I0315 10:09:33.885362       1 deployment_controller.go:147] Starting deployment controller
I0315 10:09:33.885908       1 controllermanager.go:437] Started "replicaset"
I0315 10:09:33.886061       1 replica_set.go:155] Starting ReplicaSet controller
I0315 10:09:33.886661       1 controllermanager.go:437] Started "disruption"
I0315 10:09:33.886859       1 disruption.go:269] Starting disruption controller
I0315 10:09:33.887294       1 controllermanager.go:437] Started "cronjob"
I0315 10:09:33.887425       1 cronjob_controller.go:95] Starting CronJob Manager
I0315 10:09:33.889134       1 controllermanager.go:437] Started "podgc"
I0315 10:09:34.492059       1 controllermanager.go:437] Started "namespace"
I0315 10:09:34.492222       1 namespace_controller.go:189] Starting the NamespaceController
I0315 10:09:34.492998       1 controllermanager.go:437] Started "ttl"
I0315 10:09:34.493126       1 ttlcontroller.go:117] Starting TTL controller
I0315 10:09:34.493991       1 controllermanager.go:437] Started "statefuleset"
W0315 10:09:34.494012       1 controllermanager.go:421] "tokencleaner" is disabled
I0315 10:09:34.494167       1 stateful_set.go:144] Starting statefulset controller
I0315 10:09:34.494891       1 controllermanager.go:437] Started "replicationcontroller"
I0315 10:09:34.495000       1 replication_controller.go:150] Starting RC Manager
I0315 10:09:34.495843       1 controllermanager.go:437] Started "resourcequota"
I0315 10:09:34.495951       1 resource_quota_controller.go:240] Starting resource quota controller
I0315 10:09:34.496627       1 controllermanager.go:437] Started "daemonset"
I0315 10:09:34.496753       1 daemoncontroller.go:199] Starting Daemon Sets controller manager
E0315 10:09:34.497214       1 certificates.go:38] Failed to start certificate controller: open /etc/kubernetes/ca/ca.pem: no such file or directory
W0315 10:09:34.497237       1 controllermanager.go:434] Skipping "certificatesigningrequests"
W0315 10:09:34.497247       1 controllermanager.go:421] "bootstrapsigner" is disabled
I0315 10:09:34.497850       1 controllermanager.go:437] Started "endpoint"
E0315 10:09:34.597609       1 controllermanager.go:430] Error starting "garbagecollector"
F0315 10:09:34.597631       1 controllermanager.go:181] error running controllers: Failed to start the generic garbage collector: no matches for {monitoring.coreos.com v1alpha1 alertmanagers}
```

**What you expected to happen**:
The controller-manager to run

**How to reproduce it** (as minimally and precisely as possible):
By the looks of it, use ThirdPartyResources and upgrade to 1.6?

**Anything else we need to know**:

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: kind/bug

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG API Machinery.
labels.name: sig/api-machinery

title: garbage collector controller fails to start with registered ThirdPartyResources
